ygData.subject: Re: ATTACK!
ygData.msgSnippet: Ignatius heard the reply from the other bots, it sounded like they were going to destroy the base anyways. I don t have enough power to operate the computer,

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Ignatius heard the reply from the other bots, it sounded like they were
going to destroy the base anyways. "I don't have enough power to operate the
computer, how in the inferno blasted pit could I self destruct the stinking
base, It's taking practically all the reserve power to keep the BLEEPING
comm open to surrender to your  slagging troops. Besides if you cut through
you'll be damaging the supplies in our upper supply depots." He hoped that
the supplies would be more important than the risk.

Before the ship could respond a wave of fire struck the roof. blowing it to
pieces sending it down into the control room on top of Ignatius. "Now that
was just BRILLIANT, you tell me to come out then bury me alive." Ignatius
had taken more abuse in this one day than he had dureing the entire war, He
wanted more than anything to curl up in a lube bath and sleep for months.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Legendarynemasis@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 04, 2001 12:24 PM
Subject: Re: ATTACK!


> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Ignatius fealt worried about the predicament. He looked around the
> room, A
> > dim light from the emergency flashers filled the room. The base was
> now on
> > reserve power and he was trapped inside until the system reset. He
> opened a
> > comm again, "I'd love to come out, but unfortunately the doors are
> stuck,
> > I'd apreciate it if you'd send a rescue party." The bot hated being
> so
> > polite but he knew he had no choice, if he was rude there wouldn't
> be enough
> > left of the base, or him, to capture.
>
> Vile growls as he recieves the comm from the bases commander before
> sending one of his own to the base.
>
> Vile: "Rescue party? and run the risk of you self destructing your
> abse and killing some of my crew? I think not. We'll blast you out."
>
> Vile smirks before both Mega cannons rotate and aim at where the
> Violator's computer had traced the comm from. A moment later each
> megacannon opens fire on the roof above with 3 shots.
>
>
